references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Invariant Risk Minimization (IRM), a key theoretical framework for addressing out-of-distribution generalization, which is the central topic of the target paper.

This paper proposes GroupDRO, a method for improving the robustness of neural networks against distributional shifts, which is directly related to the time series OOD generalization problem tackled in the target paper.
This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of the field of OOD generalization, offering a valuable context and background for the target paper's contributions.

references.paper_title: Bilevel optimization: Convergence analysis and enhanced design
references.reason: This paper offers a detailed analysis of bilevel optimization, a crucial technique used in the TTSO framework proposed in the target paper for solving the tri-level optimization problem.

references.paper_title: Ts2vec: Towards universal representation of time series
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel contrastive learning method for time series, which is directly applied and extended in the target paper for improving the robustness of time series representations.
